creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription: LL verso, vertically in brown ink: [...trand Sante fria me / vf .770] (?); across bottom in pencil: [Whistler - Fishing-Boat W.178 K.208]; [Fishing Boat No 11 - one of 26 etchings]; [(butterfly monogram)]
markings:
Watermark
LC verso, unidentifed mark in pencil: [(I / (backward c) <)]
portfolio: From The Second Venice Set or Twenty-Six Etchings 1886
signed: LL recto, in pencil: sheet trimmed leaving a tab for Whistler's butterfly monogram and [imp.]
title: Fishing-Boat from The Second Venice Set
